description:
LED SMD 100W Floodlight with Construction Stand and Cable is an excellent work light that combines efficiency and convenience.


The use of 144 SMD LED diodes with low heat emission ensures optimal brightness and performance with minimal energy consumption. The emitted light color is 6500K, corresponding to a cold white tone. This light color is ideal for interior finishing work, highlighting imperfections on treated walls.

The telescopic construction stand is a solid and versatile solution, perfect for illuminating large areas on construction sites. Made from durable metal, it provides ease of use and stability.
The stand offers height adjustment from 60 cm to a maximum of 160 cm, allowing it to adapt to various lighting needs. Thanks to convenient, smoothly operating plastic knobs, the adjustment is quick and intuitive.


Product features:



  • Powerful non-heating LED lamp,

  • Bright light color - cold white

  • Adjustable tilt angle

  • Light angle: 120°

  • Solid adjustable telescopic stand

  • The stand has a place for holding the coiled cable

  • Smooth-operating knobs for height adjustment

  • Stand mounted on 3 legs


Technical specifications:



  • Power: 100W

  • Lighting angle: 120°

  • Frame type: adjustable

  • Material: metal, tempered glass

  • Lamp type: SMD LED (x144)

  • Color temperature: 6500K - cold white

  • Luminous flux: 10,000 lm

  • Lens dimensions: 22.5 x 15.5 cm

  • Maximum stand height: 160 cm

  • Minimum stand height: 60 cm

  • Maximum leg spread: 80 cm

  • Cable length: 1.5m

  • Energy class: E

  • Color rendering index: Ra>80

description.name: Bent chisel SDS Plus 75*165mm
description.long_desc:
Discover the versatility and reliability of the curved SDS PLUS chisel, with a width of 75 mm and a length of 165 mm, an excellent tool for various construction and renovation tasks.


Applications:


Removing Old Plaster: The chisel effectively removes old plasters from both concrete and bricks, preparing the surface for further work.


Demolition of Ceramic Tiles: Effectively breaks and removes old ceramic tiles from floors and walls, facilitating the renovation process of bathrooms or kitchens.


Finishing Works: Excellent for smoothing and cleaning concrete edges, preparing them for the installation of new finishing materials such as tiles or panels.


Structure Disassembly: Helps in the precise dismantling of old walls, foundations, or concrete elements without risking damage to surrounding structures.


Technical Specifications:


Holder: SDS-Plus


Material: High-quality steel


Blade Width: 75 mm


Total Length of the Chisel: 165 mm


Angle: 15°


Weight: 270 grams

description.name: Foldable workshop lamp with a magnet LED COB 5W + 3W 2600mAh 650lm IP44
description.long_desc:
Foldable workshop lamp from the professional tool brand Tvardy. Equipped with three light sources: main 5W COB LED, front 3W COB LED, and a spot auxiliary light. Four working modes allow for adjusting the type and intensity of light to the current task. An extraordinary advantage of our workshop lamp is the magnet and hook for hanging built into the base, allowing you to conveniently mount it on various metal surfaces or hang it in a convenient location.



  • Sturdy Construction: Our flashlight is made of high-quality ABS plastic and metal, making it exceptionally resistant to damage.

  • Powerful LED Light: The light is emitted by COB LED chips, with the main light at 5W providing neutral light with a temperature of 7000K and an intensity of up to 650 lumens.

  • Long Working Time: The built-in 2600mAh battery allows for uninterrupted operation of the lamp for up to 12 hours.

  • User Convenience: The flashlight is equipped with a strong magnet and hook, making it easy to mount the lamp in the desired location. This is an invaluable solution wherever you need both hands for work.

  • USB Type-C Port: With the built-in USB Type-C port, charging the lamp is simple, convenient, and fast.

  • Four Lighting Modes: Main Light - 50% power, Main Light - 100% power, Front Light, Auxiliary Light.

  • Adjustable Light Angle: Allows you to adjust the light angle to best illuminate the area you choose.


Technical Specifications:


Housing Material: durable ABS plastic + metal


Light Source: 5W+3W+spot light


Light Temperature: 6500K-7000K


Light Intensity: 650 lumens


Battery Capacity: 2600mAh


Maximum Working Time: 12 hours


Charging Time: 3.5 hours


Voltage: 3.7V


Working Modes: Main Light - 50% power, Main Light - 100% power, Front Light, Auxiliary Light


Charging Port: USB Type-C


Battery Level Indicator: yes


Waterproof: yes, IP44

description.name: Workshop lamp with a magnet LED COB 5W + 3W UV laser 800mAh 400lm IP44
description.long_desc:
This modern workshop lamp from Tvardy is a versatile tool that will provide invaluable support during work in the workshop, garage, and even during trips to the forest. Thanks to its innovative design and multifunctional features, this lamp will become an essential part of your equipment.


The lamp features high-quality LED lights - wide-angle 5W and spot 3W, a strong red laser pointer, and ultraviolet light with a wavelength of 365nm. The device is resistant to objects larger than 1mm and splashing water from any direction.


Technical specification:



  • Brand: Tvardy

  • Material: Aluminum, nylon PA

  • LED Power: 5W (400 lumens), 3W (100 lumens)

  • Types of lighting: Wide, spot, ultraviolet, red laser pointer

  • Battery Capacity: 800mAh

  • Charging: Type C

  • Charging Time: Approximately 2 hours

  • Lighting Time: Up to 5 hours

  • Dimensions: 1.9 x 16.5 cm

  • Strong magnet with 120° rotation

  • 5-level device charging indicator

  • Charging cable included


The tool is equipped with a strong, practical magnet allowing easy attachment to metal surfaces, facilitating work in places requiring better illumination such as under the hood of a car. The 120° rotation function helps to adjust the light according to current needs.


The device charges in approximately 2 hours, and with the 5-level device charging indicator, we know when to recharge the device. USB charging cable - USB Type C included.


Thanks to the built-in 800mAh battery, the lamp can shine for up to 5 hours, making it a reliable companion during prolonged tasks.


Device functions:



  • First press of the "power" button - 3W 100 lumens spot LED light - lighting duration on one battery up to 2 hours.

  • Second press of the "power" button - 5W 400 lumens wide LED light - lighting duration on one charge - up to 2 hours.

  • Third press of the "power" button - ultraviolet light with a wavelength of 365nm - lighting duration on one charge - up to 3 hours.

  • Fourth press of the "power" button - turns off the device.

  • Quick double press of the "laser" button - turns on the red laser pointer

  • Single press of the "laser" button - turns off the laser

  • Hold the "power" button - while the light is on: spot, wide, and ultraviolet light changes the brightness level - range: 25 - 100%


Application of ultraviolet light:



  • Leak detection: UV light with a wavelength of 365nm is used to detect leaks in various materials and surfaces. For example, during repairs of hydraulic systems, air conditioning, refrigeration systems, or engine oil leaks. This type of light can be used to quickly detect even the smallest leaks.

  • Animal tracking: UV light is often used by foresters, trackers, and wildlife researchers to track and identify traces of nocturnal animals. Many organic substances, such as urine, saliva, or blood traces, fluoresce under UV light. This allows for quick and effective localization of animal traces even in difficult terrain conditions.

  • Amber detection: Under UV light, amber often exhibits characteristic fluorescence, making it easier to identify and distinguish from other stones or materials. Therefore, using a Tvardy lamp equipped with UV light, collectors and amber seekers can quickly assess the authenticity and value of their finds.

  • Banknote verification: Many modern banknotes have special markers and security features that are visible only under UV light. Therefore, using a workshop lamp with ultraviolet light, one can quickly and easily verify the authenticity of banknotes and avoid the risk of possessing counterfeit money. Additionally, this type of light also allows for reading hidden security marks and other protections that may be difficult to notice under normal lighting.

The device charges in approximately 2 hours, and with the 5-level device charging indicator, we know when to recharge the device. USB charging cable - USB Type C included.


Thanks to the built-in 800mAh battery, the lamp can shine for up to 5 hours, making it a reliable companion during prolonged tasks.


Device functions:



  • First press of the "power" button - 3W 100 lumens spot LED light - lighting duration on one battery up to 2 hours.

  • Second press of the "power" button - 5W 400 lumens wide LED light - lighting duration on one charge - up to 2 hours.

  • Third press of the "power" button - ultraviolet light with a wavelength of 365nm - lighting duration on one charge - up to 3 hours.

  • Fourth press of the "power" button - turns off the device.

  • Quick double press of the "laser" button - turns on the red laser pointer

  • Single press of the "laser" button - turns off the laser

  • Hold the "power" button - while the light is on: spot, wide, and ultraviolet light changes the brightness level - range: 25 - 100%


Application of ultraviolet light:



  • Leak detection: UV light with a wavelength of 365nm is used to detect leaks in various materials and surfaces. For example, during repairs of hydraulic systems, air conditioning, refrigeration systems, or engine oil leaks. This type of light can be used to quickly detect even the smallest leaks.

  • Animal tracking: UV light is often used by foresters, trackers, and wildlife researchers to track and identify traces of nocturnal animals. Many organic substances, such as urine, saliva, or blood traces, fluoresce under UV light. This allows for quick and effective localization of animal traces even in difficult terrain conditions.

  • Amber detection: Under UV light, amber often exhibits characteristic fluorescence, making it easier to identify and distinguish from other stones or materials. Therefore, using a Tvardy lamp equipped with UV light, collectors and amber seekers can quickly assess the authenticity and value of their finds.

  • Banknote verification: Many modern banknotes have special markers and security features that are visible only under UV light. Therefore, using a workshop lamp with ultraviolet light, one can quickly and easily verify the authenticity of banknotes and avoid the risk of possessing counterfeit money. Additionally, this type of light also allows for reading hidden security marks and other protections that may be difficult to notice under normal lighting.

description.name: Headlamp with a motion sensor LED COB 3W + 1W XPE 1200mAh 350lm IPX4
description.long_desc:
Headlamp with motion sensor equipped with a main light source in the form of a long strip of 3W LED COB diodes and 1W XPE diodes. Four operating modes allow for selecting the main light and utilizing 100% or 50% power, as well as the spotlight (100%/50%). An innovative solution applied in our headlamp is the built-in motion sensor, which enables turning the flashlight on and off with a single wave of the hand.


Product characteristics:


Solid Construction: Our flashlight is made of high-quality flexible plastic.


Powerful LED Light: Equipped with a 3W LED COB diode and a 1W XPE diode.


Long Operating Time: The built-in 1200mAh battery allows for uninterrupted operation of the flashlight for up to 8 hours.


Intelligent Motion Sensor: Our flashlight has a motion sensor that allows turning on the flashlight by waving your hand in front of it.


USB Type C Port: Thanks to the built-in USB Type C port, charging the flashlight is easy, convenient, and fast.


Four Lighting Modes: Main light - 100% or 50% power, Side light - 100% or 50% power.


Adjustable Head Strap: The soft and flexible strap with circumference adjustment allows for comfortable wearing of the headlamp. Regardless of the type of work being done, the flashlight will stay securely in place.


Technical specifications:


Material: rubber, plastic


Light source: LED COB 3W / XPE LED 1W


Light intensity: 350 lumens


Battery capacity: 1200mAh


Operating modes: Main Light - 100% or 50% power, Side Light - 100% or 50% power


Charging port: USB Type C


Waterproof: yes, IPx4

description.name: Headlamp with a rotatable head LED COB 3W + XPE 800mAh IP20
description.long_desc:
Headlamp equipped with a main light source in the form of a 3W COB LED module and 1W XPE LEDs. Two working modes allow for choosing between the 3W main light or the 1W spot light. It features an adjustable light angle inclination and a comfortable, flexible headband with circumference adjustment.


Product Characteristics:



  • LED Light: Equipped with a 3W COB LED module and a 1W XPE spotlight.

  • Built-in 800mAh battery.

  • Two Lighting Modes: Main light and spotlight.

  • Adjustable Headband: The soft and flexible band with circumference adjustment allows for comfortable wearing of the headlamp. Regardless of the type of work being done, the headlamp will stay securely in place.

  • Adjustable Light Angle Inclination: Adjust the light angle to illuminate exactly what you need. Whether you're fixing a car or exploring new trails, our headlamp is ready for anything.

Material: Plastic


Light Source: 3W COB LED / 1W XPE LED


Light Intensity: 200 lumens


Battery Capacity: 800mAh

description.name: Headlamp with a motion sensor LED COB 8W (5W+3W) 1800mAh 520lm IP44
description.long_desc:
Headlamp with motion sensor from the professional tool brand Tvardy. Equipped with a light source consisting of two 5W COB LED chips (warm white) and 3W (neutral white). Three working modes allow for choosing one of the two LED chips or simultaneous operation of both, providing a total power of 8W and generating light with an intensity of 520 lumens. An innovative feature of our headlamp is the built-in motion sensor, which, when activated, allows for turning the flashlight on and off with a single hand gesture.


Sturdy Construction: Our flashlight is made of high-quality ABS plastic, which is exceptionally resistant to mechanical damage. Whether you're hiking, in the garage, or in a dark room, this flashlight will surely meet your expectations.


Powerful LED Light: Equipped with two COB LED chips of 5W+3W, our flashlight emits bright light with a color temperature of 4000K-7000K and an intensity of up to 520 lumens.


Long Working Time: The built-in 1800mAh battery allows for uninterrupted operation of the flashlight for up to 8 hours.


Intelligent Motion Sensor: Our flashlight features a motion sensor that enables turning on the flashlight with a hand gesture.


USB Type-C Port: With the built-in USB Type-C port, charging the flashlight is simple, convenient, and fast.


Three Lighting Modes: Neutral Light (3W), Warm Light (5W), Neutral + Warm Light (8W), each mode allows for adjusting the light intensity by holding the flashlight switch.


Adjustable Head Strap: The soft and flexible head strap with adjustable circumference ensures comfortable wearing of the flashlight on the head. Regardless of the task at hand, the flashlight will stay securely in place.


Adjustable Light Angle: Adjust the light angle to illuminate precisely what you need. Whether you're repairing a car or exploring new trails, our flashlight is ready for anything.


Technical Specifications:


Housing Material: durable ABS plastic


Light Source: 5W+3W


Light Temperature: 4000K-7000K


Light Intensity: 520 lumens


Battery Capacity: 1800mAh


Voltage: 3.7V


Working Modes: Neutral Light (3W), Warm Light (5W), Neutral + Warm Light (8W)


Charging Port: USB Type-C


Battery Level Indicator: yes


Waterproof: yes, IP44

description.name: Supper straps - convenient type
description.long_desc:
Doświadcz maksymalnego komfortu i wsparcia dzięki regulowanym szelkom marki John Gardener. Zaprojektowane z szerokimi pasami i regulowanymi zapięciami, te szelki zapewniają idealne dopasowanie dla każdego użytkownika, zwiększając wygodę i efektywność podczas użytkowania.

  • Marka: John Gardener
  • Szerokie Pasy: Zapewniają dodatkowe wsparcie i równomiernie rozkładają ciężar
  • Regulowane Zapięcia: Umożliwiają dostosowanie do indywidualnych potrzeb, niezależnie od budowy ciała
  • Wzmocniona Konstrukcja: Gwarantuje trwałość i długotrwałe użytkowanie
  • Wygodny Zaczep: Pozwala na łatwe przymocowanie kosy spalinowej

Kluczowe Cechy:

  • Uniwersalne Dopasowanie: Dzięki szerokim pasom i regulowanym zapięciom szelki można idealnie dopasować do każdego użytkownika.
  • Zwiększona Mobilność: Pas biodrowy umożliwia swobodne poruszanie się podczas pracy, co zwiększa komfort i efektywność.
  • Trwałe i Wygodne: Zaprojektowane z wzmocnionymi pasami, te szelki oferują zarówno trwałość, jak i komfort podczas długotrwałego użytkowania.
  • Praktyczny Zaczep: Wyposażone w wygodny zaczep do wieszania kosy spalinowej, co sprawia, że są idealnym narzędziem do długotrwałych prac ogrodowych.

  • Praktyczny Zaczep: Wyposażone w wygodny zaczep do wieszania kosy spalinowej, co sprawia, że są idealnym narzędziem do długotrwałych prac ogrodowych.

description.name: Lance bended 15° with set of nozzles
description.long_desc:
A 15° bent lance along with a set of 5 nozzles, created by the renowned manufacturer Geko, constitutes an indispensable tool in the field of high-pressure cleaning. Designed for professional applications, this lance ensures effectiveness and reliability in any conditions.



  • Manufacturer: Geko

  • Max Pressure: 350 bar

  • Max Temperature: 60°C

  • Nozzle Connection: 1/4" quick-connect

  • Gun Connection: Bayonet

  • Included: 15° Bent Lance + Set of 5 Nozzles


5 Nozzles, 5 Uses



  • Red Nozzle (0°): Ideal for cleaning hard-to-reach areas and crevices, where precise focusing of the spray on a small surface is required.

  • Orange Nozzle (15°): Designed for cleaning surfaces such as bricks, concrete, or paving stones, where effective removal of dirt from larger areas is needed.

  • Green Nozzle (25°): Excellent for cleaning wood and painted surfaces, providing effective but gentle dirt removal without damage.

  • White Nozzle (40°): Specifically created for cleaning glass and windows, providing an even and effective spray without the risk of damaging delicate surfaces.

  • Black Nozzle (60°): Features a large opening, perfect for applying foam from a tank, facilitating the washing process and ensuring uniform coverage of surfaces.


High Specifications


Advanced technical parameters enable this tool to effectively tackle even the toughest dirt. With a maximum working pressure of an impressive 350 bars, it provides powerful penetration force for effectively removing dirt from various surfaces. Additionally, the Geko bent lance can operate at temperatures up to 60°C, allowing for efficient cleaning even in conditions of increased thermal exposure.


Convenient Quick-Connect


The nozzle connection, equipped with a 1/4" quick-connect, allows for rapid and hassle-free attachment and exchange of nozzles, translating into user convenience and time savings. Meanwhile, the bayonet gun connection ensures a solid and stable connection, eliminating the risk of leaks or looseness.

description.name: Foam gun 1000ml for quick connector
description.long_desc:
A 1000ml foam lance with a quick-connect pistol for pressure washers from the Geko brand is an advanced tool designed for efficient and convenient car washing and cleaning other surfaces. Made of high-quality plastic and brass and featuring precise construction, the foam lance offers reliability and durability.



  • Brand: Geko

  • Material: plastic, brass

  • Connector type: quick-connect

  • Max pressure: 350 bar

  • Max water temperature: 60°C


Active Foam Liter


Efficient Cleaning: With adjustable detergent intake and pressure regulation, the user has full control over the cleaning process, allowing for the adjustment of the amount of foam dispensed to specific needs and surface types.


Quick-Connect: The use of a quick-connect makes it easier and faster to attach and detach the foam lance from the pressure washer, increasing convenience and saving time.


High Durability: The foam lance is designed to withstand extreme conditions. With a maximum pressure capacity of 350 bar and the ability to work with water up to a maximum temperature of 60°C, it is an ideal tool for professional use.


Examples of Use


Versatile Applications: Due to its versatility, the foam lance can be used for various tasks such as washing cars, cleaning building facades, or cleaning terraces and sidewalks, making it an essential tool for both professionals and hobbyists.


Foam Flow Adjustment


Additional foam flow adjustment allows for precise adjustment of the amount of foam produced to the requirements of specific applications, ensuring optimal cleaning results.

description.name: Hose connector M22-M22
description.long_desc:
Hose nipple is a product that combines reliability and functionality, which are key for anyone who values high quality and durability. Made of brass, it is durable and resistant to corrosion, which guarantees long-lasting and reliable operation. It has two external threads M22, which ensures easy installation and excellent connection. It can be used for high-pressure hoses, e.g. from Karcher.


Product characteristics:



  • Made of brass, it is durable and resistant to corrosion, which guarantees long-lasting and reliable operation.

  • It has two external threads M22, which ensures easy installation and excellent connection.

  • It can be used for high-pressure hoses, e.g. from Karcher.


Technical specification:



  • Threads: 2x external M22

  • Material: Brass

description.name: Air dust gun 10cm
description.long_desc:
If you need a reliable and efficient blow gun, our 10 cm blow gun with a 1/4" quick coupling is the perfect solution. It works excellently in both workshop and home applications.


Key Product Features:



  • 10 cm Steel Nozzle: Equipped with a durable 10 cm steel nozzle, the blow gun ensures precise and effective blowing, ideal for removing dust, dirt, and debris from hard-to-reach areas.

  • 1/4" Quick Coupling Included: The included 1/4" quick coupling makes the blow gun compatible with most standard pneumatic systems, allowing for quick and easy connection to an air source.

  • Maximum Pressure 15 Bar: The tool operates efficiently at a maximum pressure of up to 15 Bar, providing a powerful air stream for the most demanding tasks.

  • Comfortable Handle: The ergonomically designed handle ensures user comfort, even during prolonged use, minimizing hand fatigue.

  • Hanging Capability: The blow gun features a practical hanging hook, making storage and accessibility in the workshop easier.


Technical Specifications:



  • Manufacturer: Geko

  • Nozzle Material: Steel

  • Nozzle Length: 10 cm

  • Quick Coupling: 1/4" included

  • Maximum Working Pressure: 15 Bar

  • Ergonomics: Comfortable handle

  • Functionality: Hanging capability

description.name: Air dust gun with telescopic lance 100cm
description.long_desc:
Our blow gun with a 100 cm telescopic lance is a reliable choice for every professional and DIY enthusiast.


Key Product Features:



  • 100 cm Telescopic Steel Nozzle: Equipped with a 100 cm telescopic nozzle made of steel, it allows precise access to hard-to-reach places. Additionally, the 360° rotating nozzle provides full flexibility and adjustment of the air stream direction.

  • 1/4" Quick Coupling Included: The included 1/4" quick coupling allows for quick and easy connection of the blow gun to an air source, making it compatible with most standard pneumatic systems.

  • Maximum Pressure 15 Bar: The blow gun operates efficiently at a maximum pressure of up to 15 Bar, providing a powerful and concentrated air stream to remove dust, dirt, and other debris.

  • Comfortable Handle: The ergonomically designed handle ensures user comfort, reducing hand fatigue even during prolonged use. This makes the blow gun comfortable to use at all times.

  • Hanging Capability: The blow gun features a practical hanging hook, making storage easy and ensuring convenient access in the workshop.

  • Maximum Pressure 15 Bar: The blow gun operates efficiently at a maximum pressure of up to 15 Bar, providing a powerful and concentrated air stream to remove dust, dirt, and other debris.

  • Comfortable Handle: The ergonomically designed handle ensures user comfort, reducing hand fatigue even during prolonged use. This makes the blow gun comfortable to use at all times.

  • Hanging Capability: The blow gun features a practical hanging hook, making storage easy and ensuring convenient access in the workshop.


Technical Specifications:



  • Manufacturer: Geko

  • Nozzle Material: Steel

  • Nozzle Length: 100 cm (telescopic)

  • Rotating Nozzle: 360°

  • Quick Coupling: 1/4" included

  • Maximum Working Pressure: 15 Bar

  • Ergonomics: Comfortable handle

  • Functionality: Hanging capability

description.name: 150mm Brushless Electric Orbital Sander 350W
description.long_desc:
150mm Brushless Orbital Sander GEKO is an excellent tool for professionals looking for a reliable partner on the job. With its versatility and advanced design, it allows for precise sanding and removal of various coatings from surfaces.



The ergonomic rubberized handle provides a secure grip even during extended use, reducing hand fatigue. The safe flap-style on/off switch, located under the user's hand, enhances comfort and safety, enabling immediate stop of the device if dropped.



Technical Specifications:



  • Diameter: 150mm

  • Voltage: 230V~50Hz

  • Power: 350W

  • Motor: Brushless

  • Cable: 4m in length

  • Speed: Electronically adjustable from 4000 to 10000 RPM

  • Power Levels: 6 levels, electronically adjustable for various applications

  • Speed Stability: Mechanism ensuring consistent speed under increased pressure on the sander

  • Protection Rating: IP20, ensuring safe operation for both home and professional environments

  • Orbit: 5mm, allowing effective material removal from various surfaces

  • Application: Suitable for removing layers of paint, varnish, plaster, rust, and for sanding wood

  • Dust Extraction System: Integrated, with the option to connect a vacuum cleaner, providing a clean and dust-free working environment

  • Accessories: The set includes 3 sanding papers - P80, P100, P220, and a key for mounting and dismounting the disc

  • Convenient Handle: Suitable for both right- and left-handed users

description.name: Measure tape 3m x 16mm x 0.12mm
description.long_desc:
Measure, steel retractable tape with lock. The tape is 3 m long, 16 mm wide, and 0.12 mm thick.


The carbon steel tape is finished with a sturdy measuring hook. The casing of the tape measure is made of ABS plastic. Smooth and legible scale facilitates measurement reading. Lock button operated with the thumb.


Product features:



  • lightweight and handy

  • tape made of carbon steel

  • tape lock button

  • smooth and legible scale

  • sturdy measuring hook

  • ABS plastic casing


Technical specification:



  • Tape length: 3 m

  • Tape width: 16 mm

  • Tape thickness: 0,12 mm

  • Tape lock function: yes

  • Rubber housing cover: no

  • Automatic tape lock function [autolock]: no

description.name: Safety helmet with adjustable knob RED
description.long_desc:
A safety helmet is a solid and reliable solution for head protection during work in challenging construction and industrial environments. Made from durable HDPE (high-density polyethylene), the helmet ensures high impact resistance, providing protection against falling objects and other mechanical hazards.


Technical Specifications:



  • Material: HDPE

  • Size Adjustment: 53-62 cm

  • Compliance with Standard: EN 397:2012+A1:2012

  • CE Marking

  • Notified Body Number: 2834


The product features adjustable sizing from 53 to 62 cm, allowing for a perfect fit for various head circumferences, ensuring comfort even during prolonged wear. Compliance with the European standard EN 397:2012+A1:2012 and CE marking confirm that the helmet meets strict safety requirements and complies with personal protective equipment regulations (Regulation 2016/425).


The helmet is suitable for a wide range of temperatures—from -10°C to +50°C—making it an ideal solution for both hot and cold climates.


Product Features:



  • Material: Made from durable HDPE, ensuring excellent impact resistance and durability.

  • Operating Temperature Range: From -10°C to +50°C, allowing use in various weather conditions.

  • Size Adjustment: Adjustable sizing system from 53 to 62 cm provides a perfect fit for the user’s head.

  • Compliance with EN 397:2012+A1:2012 Standard: The helmet meets European safety standards, guaranteeing protection in the workplace.

  • CE Marking: The product meets the requirements of Regulation 2016/425 on personal protective equipment, confirming its quality and safety.

  • Notified Body Number: 2834, certifying the certification process.


Applications:



  • Construction Work: The helmet is ideal for head protection on construction sites where there is a risk of falling objects and other hazards.

  • Heavy Industry: Essential for work in industrial environments requiring solid head protection.

  • Working at Heights: The helmet protects workers' heads during assembly, installation, or work in hard-to-reach areas.

  • Outdoor Work: Head protection during work in various weather conditions, both in summer and winter.
